text:
Seems that searching only accepts the US "/" delimiter for dates.
Very confusing for non-US people who wonder why focus doesn't seem to do anything 
when you write date comparisons there - it should at least give a clear indication
of something being wrong.

As a sidenote that really ought to be reported in another bug, errors handling
the input w/ LogFilePatternReceiver really ought to be reported too...

P.S. web start
creator: iheino+l4j.ack5789@cc.hut.fi
